item.description:
Milford Oval annual event - a lot of people in one place at one time... You know why we like events like this.

This starts at noon and goes until 2:00 pM.

Please RSVP if you need literature or signs etc. or mail me (organizer)

This conflicts with our scheduled canvassing (sorry - we can't actually be in 2 places at once - wait - yes we can!)

This event is definitely kid-friendly (unless Ssanta Clause has changed a lot...).
item.name: Santa on The Oval
